metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38471 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found in Avahi. A reachable assertion exists in the dbus_set_host_name function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38471` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

avahi-autoipd - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
avahi-daemon - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
avahi-discover - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
avahi-dnsconfd - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
avahi-ui-utils - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
avahi-utils - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
libavahi-client3 - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
libavahi-common-data - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
libavahi-common3 - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
libavahi-compat-libdnssd1 - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
libavahi-core7 - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
libavahi-glib1 - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
libavahi-gobject0 - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
libavahi-qt4-1 - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
libavahi-ui-gtk3-0 - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
libavahi-ui0 - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
python-avahi - 0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: avahi package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.31-4ubuntu1.3+esm3').
